ranks.text: On 4/15 as part of the story your cooperation with Ann will begin. Unlocks Baton Pass ability, letting you pass Ann's turn to other Baton Pass users in battle after a 1 More.

Requires rank 2 (considerate) kindness. The date must also be after 5/6. Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks the Girl Talk ability, giving Ann the chance to step in and rescue a failed demon negotiation.
choices: Choice 1: "She's so strong." +3 / "Are you feeling better now?" +3 / "So are you friends again?" +2
Choice 2: "You might be right." +3 / "You can't blame yourself?" +2 / "Kamoshida had the upper hand." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Follow Up ability, giving Ann the chance to attack an enemy after Joker as a follow-up. Unlocks the Inokashira Park location.
choices: Choice 5: "Can we stop yet?" +3 / "I love you." +2 / "I like you." +2
Choice 8: "Has that happened to you?" +3 / "That's odd." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "I know what you mean." +3 / "That comes down to you." +2
Choice 2: "That's hilarious." +3 / "That was mean of her." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Crocodile Tears ability, which gives Ann the chance to lower a demon's demands during demon negotiation.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Harisen Recovery ability, which gives Ann the chance to step in and heal status ailments on party members when in the party.
choices: Choice 1: "It seems that way." +3  /  "If it's a friend, yeah." +2
Choice 4: "Show her your strength." +3 / "Comfort her." +3 / "Listen to what she has to say." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Sexy Technique ability, which gives Ann the chance to seduce demons during demon negotiation.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Endure ability, giving Ann a chance to withstand a blow in combat that would usually kill.
choices: Choice 1: "You have some real guts." +3  /  "You're beautiful as-is." +2

ranks.text: This is the point when a romance with Ann Takamaki becomes available. Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Romance - "You have me."Friendship - "You have the others."Unlocks the Protect ability, giving Ann the ability to shield Joker from an attack that would be fatal.
Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Ann's Persona to its final form, Hecate.

name: Ann
location: Underground Mall in Shibuya after school.
